item.title: Advice to New Developers (or, How to Get Hired)
item.description:
Reading time: 10 minutes

It’s brutally hard to find a job as a new college grad today. And AI is changing things even for seasoned Engineers. Here’s my advice.

item.title: Advice to New Developers (or, How to Get Hired)
item.description: I get asked a lot by new developers: “how do I find a coding job?” What should I do/learn to get a really good job? Here’s my advice.
